dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
C version of reader, parser and emitter for ruamel.yaml derived from
libyaml.
dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml-clib

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services.
dependent_to.name: awscli-v2

dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core

dependent_to.description:
Converts and organises raw MRI data-sets according to the Brain Imaging
Data Structure (BIDS).
dependent_to.name: py-bidscoin

dependent_to.description:
The carputils framework for running simulations with the openCARP
software.
dependent_to.name: py-carputils

dependent_to.description: Command line program to validate and convert CITATION.cff files.
dependent_to.name: py-cffconvert

dependent_to.description: Project to handle conda recipes.
dependent_to.name: py-conda-souschef

dependent_to.description:
Custodian is a simple, robust and flexible just-in-time (JIT) job
management framework written in Python. Using custodian, you can create
wrappers that perform error checking, job management and error recovery.
It has a simple plugin framework that allows you to develop specific job
management workflows for different applications.
dependent_to.name: py-custodian

dependent_to.description: Common Workflow Language standalone document upgrader
dependent_to.name: py-cwl-upgrader

dependent_to.description: Common workflow language reference implementation
dependent_to.name: py-cwltool

dependent_to.description: dateparser -- python parser for human readable dates
dependent_to.name: py-dateparser

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: FireWorks stores, executes, and manages calculation workflows.
dependent_to.name: py-fireworks

dependent_to.description: Command-line utilities to assist in managing Galaxy servers
dependent_to.name: py-gravity

dependent_to.description: Project to generate recipes for conda packages.
dependent_to.name: py-grayskull

dependent_to.description:
Jupyter Telemetry enables Jupyter Applications to record events and
transmit
dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-telemetry

dependent_to.description: Python lib/cli for JSON/YAML schema validation
dependent_to.name: py-pykwalify

dependent_to.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.
dependent_to.name: py-pymatgen

dependent_to.description:
Advanced Python dictionaries with dot notation access Box will
automatically make otherwise inaccessible keys safe to access as an
attribute. You can always pass conversion_box=False to Box to disable
that behavior. Also, all new dict and lists added to a Box or BoxList
object are converted automatically.
dependent_to.name: py-python-box

dependent_to.description:
Robocrystallographer is a tool to generate text descriptions of crystal
structures. Similar to how a real-life crystallographer would analyse a
structure, robocrystallographer looks at the symmetry, local
environment, and extended connectivity when generating a description.
The package includes utilities for identifying molecule names, component
orientations, heterostructure information, and more.
dependent_to.name: py-robocrys

dependent_to.description: jinja2 pre and post-processor to update with YAML.
dependent_to.name: py-ruamel-yaml-jinja2

dependent_to.description: Schema Annotations for Linked Avro Data (SALAD)
dependent_to.name: py-schema-salad

dependent_to.description: Box of handy tools for Sphinx.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-toolbox

dependent_to.description:
Local filesystem registry for containers (intended for HPC) using Lmod
or Environment Modules. Works for users and admins.
dependent_to.name: singularity-hpc

description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order
name: py-ruamel-yaml

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
